All Classes

Class Description
Accessibility
Setting up accessibility on the frontend
AccessibilityType
enum for different types of accessibilities
AddUser
frame that holds the adduser functionality
AlertConfirmationWindow
The alert window that is used to warn the user about an intruder in the house.
AwayModeTest  
Child
Child class of User class
ContextOfSimulationTest  
CreateZone
Window that allows user to create a new zone.
Door
class Door is a smart object which is stored in rooms
DoorComponent
Displays the doors in each room.
DynamicLayout
DynamicLayout is a class that generates a 2-d room layout based on the room objects that are passed to it.
Edit
Frame that holds the object to be manipulated and the users and their locations to be set
EditUserProfile
Frame that allows the user to change type and apsswords of users
Guest
Child class of User
House
class house, holds the house rooms, name and smartobjects by extension
HouseReader
reads a house layout file (no error checking) and puts the information into a house class, its corresponding room arrays and the rooms corresponding smartobj array
HouseReaderTest  
HouseViewTest  
HVACComponent
The HVACComponent class will display the heating/cooling icons and the current temperature of the room in the house view
Light
class Light is a smart object and is in every room
LightComponent
Class that displays the light icon in the house view and its state
LightLockWrapper
Structural pattern WRAPPER structure meant to give the light a "lock" functionality (prevent a light from changing state)
Location
Setting up location
LocationType
a class that holds the possible location types
Login
frame that holds the login information
Main
The main driver
Months
enum for the months of the year.
Observable
Observable interface.
Observer
Observer Interface
Parent
Child class of user for permission checking
PeopleComponent
Displays the number of people of each room.
PeriodsOfDay
enum for the periods of the day.
Room
class room, which holds the name of the room and smartobjects in that room.
RoomComponent  
RoomRectangle
Class Rectangle to specify the rectangle to be drawn with a method to draw it
SaveUsers
Window that prompts the user to select if they want to save the user changes or not.
SetSeasons
Window that allows user to set the periods for Winter and Summer seasons.
SHCCorefunctionality
Test case class holding tests pertaining to SHC
SHH
SHH observer class that manages the SHH tab in the SmartHomeDashboard and updates the HVAC
SHPObserver
Observer Class for SHP component.
SimulationParameterTest  
SmartHomeDashboard
main frame that holds the dashboard and acts as a central hub
SmartHomeHeatingTest  
Smartobj
class smartobj, which the smart obj general type its abstract as there is no smartobject that is simply a smart object.
SmartObjectType
holds acceptable smart object types
Stranger
holds the stranger class for permission purposes
User
Parent class of all user types
UserDatabaseManager
Handles the user database files.
UserManager
The class that handles user maintenance and interaction
UserTypes
List of acceptable user types
Window
class window is a smart object which is stored in rooms
WindowComponent
Displays the number of windows of each room.
WrongExtensionException
Exception class for uploading a file with the wrong extension.
Zone
heating and cooling zones, used for keeping track of the desired temps, rooms and overriden rooms
ZoneManager
a manager class that stores and manipulates all zone objects
